name: Hatchling (Chips)
description:
This project is my submission to the FGJ's very first Pride Jam! I was planning on adding more story, but like it tends to happen in jams - I started to ran out of time. :D However, I think my scope was closer to being achievable than last time I participated in a jam.

In a nutshell the game is about two dad birds who are trying to take care of their kid.
